DOC.brief_summary: The investigators performed a 4-week, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled human trial to evaluate the efficacy and safety of InSan Bamboo Salt on improvement of Helicobacter pylori infection. The investigators measured improvement of Helicobacter pylori infection parameters , including 14C-UBT(Urea breath test), and subjects' symptoms, and monitored their blood pressure.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of InSan Bamboo Salt on Improvement of Helicobacter Pylori Infection
